overview: The Holechek Brothers (David & Daniel) together with Philosophy In Motion LLC & Solare Entertainmen present 'Moya', a clean cut ganster murder action short film with great cinematic style and brilliant acting, cast and script. A short bite with great potentical for a feature film. The synopsis: Marc treads hesitantly down a path of sin, seeking control over his increasingly changing world. He seeks comfort in the arms of Natalia, a beautiful young woman on the run from her past. Little does he know his actions will lead to an explosive confrontation that quickly turns deadly. Marc is witness to a brutal attack and a cold-blooded murder. Now he has to find the strength to make the right decision between what is safe and what is right.
title: Moya
